message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business, and I'm confident you'll see significant returns on your investment. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're interested in the product, Bob, but I have to make a living, and I need to ensure I'm fairly compensated for this valuable asset. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $1300000 to make it worth my while. This is my final offer for now.

I understand that you need to make a living, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $950000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not convinced that $950000 is enough to compensate me for the value this product holds. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need $1250000 to make it worth my while. This is a fair price, considering the product's worth to you and the value I'm bringing to the table.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $1175000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.
